TopicTitle: Texture on the wron side of model

Articles.Content:
Unity applies the texture to the inside of my model instead of the outside, this way it looks really strange and crappy.

Is there any way to make unity put it where I want it? (or on both sides, as I don't actually care weather the inside is textured or not)
In your modelling program, you need to reverse the normals on your geometry.
